attributes.action: put into effect a law forcing companies to give African farmers a fair price
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: African farmers receive less than 1% of the value clothes made from their materials.  They cannot negotiate because they are so poor they need what money they can get.  I propose that a law be put into effect, forcing companies to pay African farmers 25% of what they intend to sell the finished product for.
